original: de la rang bzhin med pa nyid las stong pa ste /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin med pa nyid las stong pa ste /
translated: Emptiness of that which is essenceless.

original: stong pa de'i dngos po ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa de'i dngos po ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The entity of that emptiness is emptiness.

original: 'dir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes bya ni stong pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes bya ni stong pa'o //
translated: Here, the object of knowledge of the past and future is empty.

original: de'i dngos po mthong ba ni stong pa nyid de zab pa dang rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos po mthong ba ni stong pa nyid de zab pa dang rgya che ba'o //
translated: The entity of that, which is seeing, is emptiness, which is profound and vast.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa med pa'i phyir zab pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa med pa'i phyir zab pa'o //
translated: It is profound because of the nonexistence of the past and future.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rgya che ba'i phyir rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rgya che ba'i phyir rgya che ba'o //
translated: It is vast because of the vastness of the past and future.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'am de 'dzin par byed pa'i ye shes ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'o //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'am de 'dzin par byed pa'i ye shes ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'o //
translated: The wisdom that illustrates that or that apprehends that is the liberation of emptiness.

original: des rnam par dag pa bzhi pa'i gnas skabs zad pa las mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: des rnam par dag pa bzhi pa'i gnas skabs zad pa las mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'o //
translated: By that, the fourth state of purification is the great immutable bliss from the exhaustion of the afflictions.

original: kam bde ba 'gog par byed do zhes pa snying rje'i mtshan nyid ye shes rdo rje ste /
analyzed: kam bde ba 'gog par byed do zhes pa snying rje'i mtshan nyid ye shes rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra of wisdom is the characteristic of compassion, which is the cessation of bliss.

original: de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
translated: That itself is the body of innate joy, the nature of wisdom and means, called the yoga of purity.

original: mtshan ma ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub ces pa la sogs pa @224a * //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub ces pa la sogs pa @224a * //
translated: Signs are buddhas, bodhisattvas, and so on.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyi rgyu ste /
translated: They are the cause of the conceptual mind.

original: rgyu stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyu med la de'i phyir gang la mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i ye shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyu med la de'i phyir gang la mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i ye shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //
translated: Because the cause is emptiness, it is causeless. Therefore, the wisdom of signlessness, the liberation of signlessness, is that which is without signs.

original: des rnam par dag pa shin tu gnyid log zad pa las rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa gnyis dang bral ba byams pa'i bdag nyid sku gnyis su spros pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems thugs rdo rje
analyzed: des rnam par dag pa shin tu gnyid log zad pa las rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa gnyis dang bral ba byams pa'i bdag nyid sku gnyis su spros pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems thugs rdo rje
translated: By that purity, one is free from the duality of permanence and impermanence, and so on, of the exhaustion of deep sleep. The nature of love, the two bodies, and the activities for the welfare of beings through the elaborations are the nonconceptual mind, the mind-vajra.

original: ste / de nyid chos kyi sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ste / de nyid chos kyi sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
translated: That itself is the dharmakƒÅya, the nature of wisdom and means, called the yoga of purity.

original: mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir rtog pa med la rtog pa med pa ni smon pa med pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir rtog pa med la rtog pa med pa ni smon pa med pa ste /
translated: It is non-conceptual because of the very absence of signs. Non-conceptuality is wishlessness.

original: smon pa ni bdag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa yin la gang la de med pa ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thang pa'o //
analyzed: smon pa ni bdag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces pa la sogs pa yin la gang la de med pa ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thang pa'o //
translated: Wishing is the wish, ‚ÄúMay I become a perfect Buddha,‚Äù etc. That which is devoid of that is the wishlessness aspect.

original: des rnam par dag pa rmi lam zad pa las mi zad cing gzhom du med pa'i sgra sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi bdag nyid kyi sngags dga' ba'i mtshan nyid sems can thams cad kyi skad rnams kyis sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i phyir dang
analyzed: des rnam par dag pa rmi lam zad pa las mi zad cing gzhom du med pa'i sgra sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi bdag nyid kyi sngags dga' ba'i mtshan nyid sems can thams cad kyi skad rnams kyis sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i phyir dang
translated: By that purity, the mantra is the indestructible, invincible sound, the nature of the inexhaustible dream, the nature of the speech of all sentient beings, having the character of delight, because it delights all sentient beings with the speech of all sentient beings.

original: yid skyob par byed pa'i phyir yang sngags gsung rdo rje ste /
analyzed: yid skyob par byed pa'i phyir yang sngags gsung rdo rje ste /
translated: And because it protects the mind, it is the mantra Speech-vajra.

original: de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
translated: That itself is the Enjoyment Body, and is called the mantra yoga, having the nature of wisdom and means.

original: smon pa med pa'i phyir gang la dkar po dang srog gi rtsol ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par 'du byed pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //üîΩdes rnam par dag pa sad pa'i gnas skabs zad pa las mtha' yas pa mtha' yas pa'i sprul pa'i sku spros pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po las 'dren par byed pa drag po dang chags pa dang bcas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i phyir gang la dkar po dang srog gi rtsol ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par 'du byed pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'o // des rnam par dag pa sad pa'i gnas skabs zad pa las mtha' yas pa mtha' yas pa'i sprul pa'i sku spros pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po las 'dren par byed pa drag po dang chags pa dang bcas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams
translated: The door of liberation of non-compoundedness is the non-compounding of the characteristics of white, life-force, and consciousness.

analyzed: kyis dog pa med pa btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid sku rdo rje ste /
translated: By that, the infinite emanation body is drawn from the exhaustion of the state of awakened purity. The emanation body is the antidote to the afflictions. It is the body of Vajra Body, the nature of equanimity, which is without obstruction.

original: de nyid sprul pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dbyibs kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid sprul pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dbyibs kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
translated: It is the emanation body, the nature of wisdom and method. It is called the yoga of shape.

analyzed: de dri ma med pa'i 'od du tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i bshad par gsungs pa /

translated: That itself is the body of innate joy, purified by the liberation gate of emptiness, the vajra of pristine awareness, the nature of wisdom and means, called the yoga of complete purity.üîΩThat itself is the dharmakƒÅya, purified by the liberation gate of signlessness, the vajra of mind, the pristine awareness body, the nature of wisdom and means, called the yoga of the nature of phenomena.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhin rnams kyis //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhin rnams kyis //
